definitions.definition: The (thing, person, idea, etc) indicated or understood from context, especially if more remote physically, temporally or mentally than one designated as " this ", or if expressing distinction.
examples: That book is a good read. This one isn't.
That cat of yours is evil.

main_definition: ( demonstrative ) The (thing, person, idea, etc) indicated or understood from context, especially if more remote physically, temporally or mentally than one designated as " this ", or if expressing distinction.
